line_1: The filmy slumber quit my lids,
line_2: But when at length Remembrance bids

line_1: Joyous the Orbs unfold their op'ning Lids.
line_2: Again behold; but when the Guardian bids,

line_1: Ere our eyes are clos'd up in their lids,
line_2: Which the sun-shine and daylight forbids.

line_1: The dew of sleep to fall upon his lids;
line_2: E'en at that hour, CARE, tyrant CARE, forbids,

line_1: Can'st thou, the tear just trembling on thy lids,
line_2: And while the dreadful risque foreseen, forbids,

line_1: Oh! she has torn the slumbers from my lids:
line_2: And yet Content th' insidious fiend forbids —

line_1: Ere our eyes are clos'd up in their lids,
line_2: Which the sunshine and daylight forbids.
